availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Tresenriter (Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy G. Tucker Tresenriter in Green County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1848. Father of Mary M. Tresenriter, John W. Trasenriter, and Ann E. Trasenriter. Blacksmith in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Green County in 1850. Blacksmith in Green County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Green County in 1860. Blacksmith in Green County in 1863.
